text: The 2007 Tour of Wellington or 2007 Trust House Classic was held from 24 to 28 January 2007 in New Zealand. It is a multiple stage road cycling race that takes place over seven stages with a total of 499.3 kilometres and is part of the 2006-2007 UCI Oceania Tour. ==Men's stage summary== {| bgcolor="#f7f8ff"
